name: Associació SVS -Acció en Blau
goal: We are a social action non-profit association founded in order to promote equal rights & opportunities with "Persons First" in mind in the widest possible sense of plurality and diversity, without discrimination for whatsoever reason of difference.
interests: Agriculture, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Sport, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives:
We are especially interested in social justice, equal rights and quality of living without discriminations for whatsoever reason of diversity.

We advocate community development based on sustainability goals within the scope of Europe 2020 and the UN Agenda 2030, with environmental conservation as a priority towards erradication of poverty and with social inclusion as our main goal.
